Maintenance of two centrifugal screw chillers, a cooling tower and related equipment:
full_summary:
### EFA66-232115 Maintenance of Two Centrifugal Screw Chillers and Related Equipment in Montreal
### (English and French text available below)

#### Notice for Request for Proposal (RFP) - Competitive bid

**Reference Number:** WS4587904041
**Publication Date:** 11/06/2024
**Bid Closing Date:** 17/07/2024 (14:00 Hrs. ET)

Tenders are invited by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) for the maintenance of two centrifugal screw chillers, a cooling tower and related equipment located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

**Scope of Work:**
The contract shall cover the maintenance and operation of the above-mentioned equipment at the specified location.

**Services to be Performed:**

* Maintenance of two centrifugal screw chillers
* Service of the cooling tower
* Maintenance and repair of related equipment

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal - Competitive Bid
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:** The bid is open to suppliers from countries that have a trade agreement with Canada, including but not limited to:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information:**
Jessica Cossette Fontaine
Contact Email: [jessica.cossettefontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.cossettefontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
